document_data.name: Fire Touch
document_data.mainbody: '''''Fire touch''''' was a [[spell]] that would provide extra [[fire]] damage to an ally's attacks.
document_data.Effects: Once touched, the recipient would be surrounded by a blazing aura. The aura itself would lend its energy to every attack, causing an enemy to take additional fire damage. The blazing aura did not harm whoever it surrounded.
document_data.History: The spell was used by some powerful [[magic-user]]s in [[North Faerûn|north]] and [[northwest Faerûn]], specifically in the [[Savage Frontier]] and [[Moonsea]] regions.
